name: waamazeing waadventure

description: A 20x20 maze, a 30x30 maze, and finally, a 40x40 maze. It's possible to get all four treasure pieces and Keyzer, and there are no softlocks. I think I've played through 7 times trying to find softlocks, it would have been better if I hadn't used a tileset without frog blocks for the first maze

name: Final Boss Linear Test
creator: WarioSpore
description: this is a level to test the final boss room, if the level was longer. it was also a test to show how the chests interact if they're not in their original places and moved else where, which seems to only show their original chest animations positions, and not where the new chests are. as soon as the animation ends, i notice that the new chest locations no longer show the chest itself, which i find interesting. playing the boss itself, definitely changes the difficulty of the final boss in each stage, depending on how you succeed each stage. the first stage, sometimes you're having to chase down the 3rd or 4th mask and trying to make timed jumps. 2nd phase is, personally, the most difficult stage. there is a strategy for each thrown item, but i wont tell you :smirk:. I haven't gotten to the last stage yet, but I think it might be the easiest stage, because you dont have to jump over spikes as much as the original. Due to it's difficulty, I extended the time to about 10 minutes to all :Normal:, :Hard:, & :SHard:. If you want to challenge yourself, reduce the time in the maker. NOTE: In order to try out the level, you must have access to the Golden Passage.

name: Daily 002
creator: ssp
description: Just to celebrate a 4-day holiday here and get some free time to make a level, xD

name: Daily 003
creator: ssp
description: Only Normal mode available, zipless. PS: do quick save frequently, you always have one chance in some places, and if you don't act in some correct order, the level cannot be finished also wario gets stuck

name: Daily 004
creator: ssp
description: Only Normal mode available, zipless (only must skill: single midair rock jump, indeed if you know how to clip into the wall, you can go everywhere you want, xD). PS: do quick save frequently, you always have one chance in some places, and if you don't act in some correct order, the level cannot be finished also wario gets stuck

name: Pesky cat block tower
creator: Blanchon
description:
Single level hack (Toy Block Tower), original WL4 style although there are untypical puzzles (easy and "hard" ones) and it is more challenging overall. The level is also quite long and filled with secrets, it will take some time to fully explore!

 Decoration is not done yet for the most part (will finish it later), but the level is 100% completable.
tags: Casual, Puzzles, Secrets, Platforming, Single Level

name: Hollow Wario
creator: ssp
description: the release version of Hollow Wario, only the Normal mode is available. first Level completed. Idk if i will going to add new levels to this hack but i don't have idea for a long time.

name: WarioLand 4 X 0.1
creator: violetyosh
description: It's basically trying to make warioland 4 more challenging, but not unfair. Tutorial edited and the update contains: Spoiled Rotten X and PalmTree Paradise X

name: Wario Land 4 2
creator: WarioSpore & ...
description: The Golden Diva is back for revenge after being defeated by Wario. This time they designed the pyramid with more challenging passages along with new types! While that, all is gold is missing once again! Will Wario triumph once again and retrieve his beloved treasures?

name: Wario Land 4: Parallel World v1.03
creator: beco
description: This is a complete rom hack of Wario Land 4 that I've worked on January 2020 - August 2021.

name: Time Attack Edition ver1.5
creator: beco
description:
[Features]
* Timer is always on top-right of screen in level (replaced coin display, it shows Minutes'Seconds'Frames)
* Best time will be saved when escape with all four jewel pieces and Keyzer for each level/difficulty
* Taking the lap time for each jewel piece and Keyzer and will be saved when escape with best time
* Timer blinks when beating the best time
- To clear all best times, hold L+R when boot the game
* Retry current level from pause menu
* Change difficulty (press SELECT in the passage screen)
* Faster movement in the map screen
* Shorter cutscenes

name: Custom Block Master
creator: beco
description:
A single level hack with Blanchon's custom blocks
All three difficulties are available. Press SELECT in the passage screen to switch difficulty.
tags: Casual, Puzzles, Secrets, Platforming, Single Level, Custom Blocks

name: Wario Land 4: Magic Crystals v0.1 demo
creator: beco
description:
My new WIP rom hack I've been working on since around July 2022.
This is like PW but put new mechanisms and more custom blocks.
Planning to make this a full length hack eventually but it will take time because I'm working on both level editing and patch,
also not sure if I can keep my motivation alive and working on this consistently until the end,
so I'm releasing the early demo as I promised. I hope you enjoy it! (any feedback would be appreciated)

name: Daily 0x00E
creator: ssp
description:
Wario goes to play magic carpets in some weird black block tower.
(v1.1)

name: Wario Land 4: PT-like Moveset Conversion Patches
creator: beco
description:
Including Moveset:
- Roll (holding down during dash)
- Super Jump (press up during dash)
- Shoulder Bash (press B during super jump)
- Non-stop dash direction change
- Ground pound during dash

name: Bonus Level
creator: BenjaGames
description: A WL4 Hack that replaces Hall of Hieroglyphs (like all the other hacks) as a level with the style of a bonus pipe room.</br>This hack supports all three modes (Normal, Hard, S-Hard)</br>that's really all i can say besides it's fairly easy except for s-hard</br> which had to be tweaked multiple times so it's not that frustrating

name: Blueprint Realm
creator: Evbev
description: This level replaces Hall of Hieroglyphs, it is compatible with all 3 difficulties. The level has a lot of breakable walls hiding secrets and sometimes treasure chests, it also makes use of the climbable iron webs from Pinball Zone.
